text: Ed Maley is an 9th dan judoka from the United States. Maley was born in Brooklyn, New York City. Ed Maley was inducted into the Black Belt Magazine Hall of Fame in 1980. Ed Maley has been teaching judo for 65 years, starting judo as a teenager in New York city and continuing while in the Air Force. From 1959-1965, Ed was the Florida State Champion. Ed currently teaches in Florida, his school has been open since 1963. Ed has trained many national champions during his training. ==References== Category:American male judoka Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Ed Maley
